about_the_game:
Calling All Animal Lovers!

For All Animal Lovers 8 and Up! Have tons of fun running your very own pet vet clinic. As doctor, you’ll get to take care of fuzzy bunnies, adorable cats, dogs, horses, ponies, and even piglets. Enjoy awesome activities from check-ups to dog training and horseback riding. You’ll learn amazing facts about animals while you treat, care for, and love them!

  • 3 levels of challenging gameplay
  • Tons of animals including horses, ponies, dogs, cats, rabbits, and piglets
  • 100+ animal ailments to diagnose and treat!
  • Earn a good reputation with pet owners and watch your business grow!
  • Play in freestyle or story mode
  • Great 3D graphics and animations
  • Examine! Investigate the symptoms and ﬁnd out what’s wrong.
  • Diagnose! What does your animal patient have?
  • Treat! It’s up to you to get your patients on the road to recovery.
  • Go Shopping for foods, pet toys, vet supplies, and more!
  • Train! Work with your horses on their jumping skills.
  • Teach your dogs and pigs to sit, lie down, roll over, and fetch.
  • Go Riding! You can even bring the little foal along with you!

name: Pet Vet 3D Animal Hospital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphic card 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: 1,8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphic card 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: Have tons of fun running your very own pet vet clinic. As doctor, you’ll get to take care of fuzzy bunnies, adorable cats, dogs, horses, ponies, and even piglets. Enjoy awesome activities from check-ups to dog training and horseback riding.
